Here it goes. Make a new class that branches from theif called Cat Burgular. 
Skills:
Back Stab: If attacking the back, does 2x damage.
Acrobatics: Gives you a 2 second flight potion.
Persuasion/Mediate( tactics ogre style! ) Allows you to add the enemy to your 
team if they are mortally wounded or the last enemy.
And the last one, or my real favorite:
Steal: Allows you to steal and use a random enemy attack. Costs double MP as 
normal, but allows a Burgular with Boomerang, Faerie Dust, or even Poison 
Cloud!



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
